text: hello, not sure if someone already noticed this issue but on the fields.json, it seems the inherited_value is not working/appearing anymore on the theme settings? or am i  doing something wrong here?
Reusable sections are able be able to be cloned down to child themes

I want to make a macro for use in custom components that includes content in either a full-width or contained content area in such a way that the width (disregarding padding) is consistent with drag and drop areas.

Which markup and/or HuBL tags do I need to include in either case (full with and container)? And of course I'm assuming this is possible, is it indeed?
I'm honestly a little confused with the various wrappers and all
